maqras.text: 15|50|arau niscaya mora sastiye'i haiche yantranadayaka sasti
15|51|arau tumi sihamtaka jana'i diya, ibraahimara atithisakalara katha
15|52|yetiya te'omloke te'omra ocarata upasthita hai ka’le, ‘chalama’, tetiya te'om ka’le, ‘niscaya ami aponalokara bisaye sankita’.
15|53|Te'omloke ka’le, ‘bhaya nakiraba, ami aponaka ejana jnani putrara susambada dibalaihe ahicho’.
15|54|Te'om ka’le, ‘bard'dhakya'i sparsa karaa satbe'o aponaloke moka (santana labhara) susambada diche? Eteke aponaloke kihara (kenekai) susambada di ache’
15|55|te'omloke ka’le, ‘ami satya susambada dicho; eteke apuni niraasa naha’ba’.
15|56|Te'om ka’le, ‘pathabhrastasakalara bahirae nija pratipalakara rahamatara paraa koneno niraasa haya’
15|57|te'om ka’le, ‘he praeraita (phiraista)sakala! Aponalokara arau kiba bisesa uddesya ache neki’
15|58|te'omloke ka’le, ‘niscaya amaka eta aparaadhi sampradayara ocaralai praerana karaa haiche
15|59|kintu lutara paraiyalara biraud'dhe nahaya, niscaya ami te'omloka ata'ike raksa karaima
15|60|kerala te'omra straira bahirae; ami sid'dhanta laicho ye, niscaya ta'i pichata arasthanakarai sakalara antarbhukta’.
15|61|Tara pichata phiraistasakala yetiya luta paraiyalara ocarata ahila
15|62|tetiya lute ka’le, ‘aponaloka dekhona aparaicita’.
15|63|Te'omloke ka’le, ‘nahaya, baram ami aponara ocaralai se'itorae lai ahicho yi bisaye sihamte sandeha posana karaichila’
15|64|‘arau ami aponara ocarata satya sambada lai ahicho arau niscaya ami satyabadi’

15|65|‘eteke apuni raatira kono eta bhagata aponara paraiyalabargaka lai ola'i ya'omka, arau apuni sihamtara piche piche gai thakiba. Aponalokara konorae'i yate pichalai ghurai nacaya; aponalokaka ya’laike yoraara adesa karaa haiche talaike guci ya'omka’.
15|66|Arau ami te'omka e'i bisaye phayacala jana'i dilo ye, niscaya sihamtaka usara lage lage samuli binasa karaa ha’ba.
15|67|Arau nagarabasi ullasita hai upasthita ha’la.
15|68|Te'om ka’le, ‘niscaya e'omloka mora atithi; eteke tomaloke moka apamana nakaraiba’.
15|69|‘Tomaloke allahara takbaraa aralambana karaa arau moka lanchita nakaraiba’.
15|70|Sihamte ka’le, ‘ami prthiraira (yi si) lokaka asraya dibalai tomaka nisedha karaa nachilo ne’
15|71|lute ka’le, ‘yadi tomaloke kiba karaiba'i bicaraa tente mora e'i choraalibora ache (bibahara madhyamata baidha upaye karaa)’.
15|72|Tomara jiranara sapata! Niscaya sihamta te'omlokara nicata mataliya hai ghurai achila.
15|73|Phalata suryodayara samayata pracanda cinamrae sihamtaka ahi dharaile
15|74|Tara pichata ami janapadaka olota'i tala-opara karai dilo arau sihamtara oparata poraa matira sila barsana karailo.
15|75|Niscaya iyata nidarsana ache paryabeksana-sakti sampanna byaktisakalara babe.
15|76|Arau niscaya seya manuhara calacala pathara kasate'i bidyamana.
15|77|Niscaya iyata muminasakalara babe ache nidarsana.
15|78|Arau a'ikaha basisakale'o achila simalanghanakarai
15|79|se'i karane ami sihamtara paraa'o pratisodha laicho, arau duyota janapada prakasya pathara damtite arasthita.
15|80|Arau arasye hijarabasiye raachulasakalaka asbikara karaichila
15|81|ami sihamtaka amara nidarsana pradana karaichilo, kintu sihamte seya upeksa karaichila.
15|82|Arau sihamte niraapade pahara kati ghara nirmana karaiba paraichila.
15|83|Tathapi'o puraara bhagata pracanda sabda'i sihamtaka ahi dharaile.
15|84|Eteke sihamte yi arjana karaichila seya sihamtara kono kamata aha nachila.

15|85|Akasasamuha arau prthirai lagate e'i duyora majara kono basturae'i ami yatharthatara bahirae srsti karaa na'i, arau niscaya kiyamata ahiba. Eteke tumi parama saujan'yara saite sihamtaka ksama karai diya.
15|86|Niscaya tomara raba, teraemi mahasrasta, mahajnani.
15|87|Arau ami tomaka pradana karaicho punah punah pathita satota ayata arau maha kora'ana.

15|88|Ami sihamtara bibhinna sraenika bhoga-bilasara yi upakarana dicho tara prati tumi ketiya'o tomara ducaku prasaraita nakaraiba. Sihamtara babe tumi dukha nakaraiba; arau tumi muminasakalara babe tomara bahu nata karaa (arthat sadaya horaa)
15|89|arau koraa, ‘niscaya ma'i prakasya satarkakarai’.
15|90|Yidarae ami aratirna karaichilo bibhaktakarai sakalara oparata
15|91|yisakale kora'anaka bibhinnabharae bibhakta karaiche.
15|92|Eteke tomara pratipalakara sapata! Niscaya ami sihamta sakaloke jeraa karaima
15|93|se'i bisaye, yito sihamte amala karaichila.
15|94|Eteke tumi yi bisaye adesapraapta haicha seya prakasyabharae pracara karaa arau musbaraikasakalara paraa mukha ghuraa'i loraa.
15|95|Niscaya bidraupakaraisakalara biraud'dhe amiye'i tomara babe yathesta
15|96|yisakale allahara lagata ana kono upasya nirdharana karae. Niscaya atisighrae'i (iyara parainama) sihamte janiba paraiba.
15|97|Arau arasye ami e'i katha jano ye, sihamtara kathata tomara mana sankucita haya
15|98|eteke tumi tomara pratipalakara tachabiha patha karaa arau chajadahakarai sakalara antarbhukta horaa.
15|99|Arau tomara mrtyu naha laike tumi tomara pratipalakara ibadata karaa.
